amendment.description: Amendment requires that Head Start employees be offered courses which include training to support families with children with disabilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-229 to include in section 18, "Children with Disabilities," in the list of areas for training to be provided by the Secretary of Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 0 (Roll no. 489).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Stearns.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 0 (Roll no. 489).
